Package com.kttdevelopment.simplehttpserver.handler

Class SessionThrottler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kttdevelopment.simplehttpserver.handler.SessionThrottler
  • public class SessionThrottler
extends Object
    Limits connections per http session. This can be used to limit simultaneous downloads.
    Since:
    03.03.00
    Version:
    03.03.00
    Author:
    Ktt Development
    See Also:
    ThrottledHandler, ServerThrottler, HttpSession

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SessionThrottler​(HttpSessionHandler sessionHandler)
      Creates a throttler that allows no connections.
      SessionThrottler​(HttpSessionHandler sessionHandler, int maxConnections)
      Creates a throttler that limits the amount of simultaneous connections a user can have.
      SessionThrottler​(HttpSessionHandler sessionHandler, Predicate<HttpSession> countsTowardsLimit)
      Creates a throttler that limits the amount of simultaneous connections a user can have and exempt connections.
      SessionThrottler​(HttpSessionHandler sessionHandler, Predicate<HttpSession> countsTowardsLimit, int maxConnections)
      Creates a throttler that limits the amount of simultaneous connections a user can have and exempt connections.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Returns the maximum allowed connections.
      void setMaxConnections​(int maxConnections)
      Sets the maximum allowed connections.

        Parameters:
        sessionHandler - session handler
        countsTowardsLimit - determines which users are subject to the limit
        maxConnections - maximum simultaneous connections (per user)
